医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关于有效诊断和治疗疥疮、臭虫和虱子的见解研究概述了疥疮、臭虫和体虱的病因和治疗方法，强调了准确诊断和社会因素的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Insights-on-diagnosing-and-treating-scabies-bedbugs-and-lice- effectively.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Insights-on-diagnosing-and-treating-scabies-bedbugs-and-lice- effectively.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=717d7e38-4402-43ec-a6fc-b7e0e967db6d Tue, 10 Sep 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Insights on diagnosing and treating scabies, bedbugs, and lice effectively
调味电子烟可降低高危人群的吸烟率和有毒物质暴露最近的一项研究表明，获得参与者喜欢的调味电子烟可显着降低高危人群的吸烟率和致癌物的暴露率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Flavored-e-香烟-cut-smoking-rates-and-有毒-exposure-in-high-risk-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Flavored-e-香烟-cut-smoking-rates-and-有毒-exposure-in-high-risk-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96fe959b-9967-44eb-b2a1-3e300bb3f54b Tue, 10 Sep 2024 20:15:00 -0400 Flavored e-cigarettes cut smoking rates and toxic exposure in high-risk groups
即使各州开始清理医疗补助，美国的未参保率在 2023 年仍保持稳定美国人口普查局周二报告称，2023 年没有医疗保险的美国人比例保持稳定，接近拜登政府在 2022 年通过扩大平价医疗法案等公共项目实现的历史最低水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/US-uninsured-rate-was-stable-in-2023-even-as-statese28099-Medicaid-purge-began.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/US-uninsured-rate-was-stable-in-2023-even-as-statese28099-Medicaid-purge-began.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f03ebfd-cd69-4254-93f0-cb38b7170d89 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 15:29:12 -0400 US uninsured rate was stable in 2023, even as states’ Medicaid purge began
基因疗法可改善博特尼亚营养不良患者的视力波氏营养不良症是一种遗传性失明，流行于瑞典西博滕地区。卡罗林斯卡学院在《自然通讯》上发表的一项新研究表明，基因疗法可以改善该疾病患者的视力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Gene-therapy-improves-vision-in-病人-with-Bothnia-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Gene-therapy-improves-vision-in-病人-with-Bothnia-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edb41783-199e-4a3e-a742-ca79cbe12a90 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 15:25:56 -0400 Gene therapy improves vision in patients with Bothnia dystrophy
新的筛查工具可评估不同患者群体的数字健康准备情况在《JAMA Network Open》上发表的一项新研究中，托马斯杰斐逊大学的研究人员开发了一种新颖的筛查工具来衡量数字健康准备情况，这对于解决不同患者群体采用远程医疗的障碍至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-screening-tool-asseses-digital-health-readiness-in-diverse-病人-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-screening-tool-asseses-digital-health-readiness-in-diverse-病人-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bda13d56-ee41-4bc6-b793-06387c5315c0 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 15:17:30 -0400 New screening tool assesses digital health readiness in diverse patient populations
认知行为疗法可提高年轻癌症患者的生活质量许多癌症患者因消极的想法、行为和情绪而与病情作斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-boosts-quality-of-life-for-young-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-boosts-quality-of-life-for-young-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=021eb229-7fc1-465c-b28f-8cf572359e9e Tue, 10 Sep 2024 15:04:55 -0400 Cognitive behavioral therapy boosts quality of life for young cancer patients
新发现揭示了肌肉如何感知机械压力瑞典于默奥大学的一项新研究表明，身体的肌肉能够感知机械压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-discovery-reveals-how-muscles-sense-mechanical-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-discovery-reveals-how-muscles-sense-mechanical-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7d4b350-9594-4fbb-9eba-9b394703e6fa Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:56:07 -0400 New discovery reveals how muscles sense mechanical pressure
确定潜在 ALS 治疗的新靶点肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 是一种影响运动神经元的破坏性神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-target-identified-for-pottial-ALS-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/New-target-identified-for-pottial-ALS-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc47eead-bba7-4aca-894a-a1449095caec Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:47:19 -0400 New target identified for potential ALS therapy
哮喘治疗与较高的流产率和生育挑战有关在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的一项大型研究显示，正在接受哮喘治疗的女性更有可能流产，并且需要生育治疗才能怀孕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Asthma-treatment-linked-to-higher-miscarriage-rates-and-fertility-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Asthma-treatment-linked-to-higher-miscarriage-rates-and-fertility-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f47d4b6-97ef-464c-befa-6de892efc534 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:12:00 -0400 Asthma treatment linked to higher miscarriage rates and fertility challenges
临床前血液测试可以预测严重的呼吸系统疾病美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一个科学团队创建了一种临床前血液测试，以识别最有可能患严重呼吸系统疾病的成年人，包括慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Preclinical-blood-test-could-predict-severe-respiratory-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Preclinical-blood-test-could-predict-severe-respiratory-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71ff073c-2b6b-4ed6-b2e1-e6b500d5392a Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:08:38 -0400 Preclinical blood test could predict severe respiratory conditions
